trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFSKYISLANDAETHERIALEXCHANGESHOP_00320_001<tab>Pray pay me no mind, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I am but a humble trader charged with purchasing unwanted gear procured by adventurers in the Diadem.

TEXT_CMNDEFSKYISLANDAETHERIALEXCHANGESHOP_00320_011<tab>I beg your pardon, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, but do you perchance have any equipment from the Diadem? No? Well, should any come into your possession, know that I will gladly purchase them.

TEXT_CMNDEFSKYISLANDAETHERIALEXCHANGESHOP_00320_021<tab>I don't suppose you've got any trinkets from the Diadem on you, do you? Didn't think so. If you know anyone who's got some, let them know I'm buying, would you?

TEXT_CMNDEFSKYISLANDAETHERIALEXCHANGESHOP_00320_031<tab>You strike me as an adventurous sort. On the off chance your adventures lead you to the Diadem, you might stumble upon a certain variety of gear─you'll know it when you see it, believe you me. Bring it here and I'll see you properly compensated.

TEXT_CMNDEFSKYISLANDAETHERIALEXCHANGESHOP_00320_041<tab>Hail to you, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. I am a collector of rare equipment, specifically those found in the Diadem. If you bring me such articles, I will furnish you with suitable recompense.
